placesVisited: Tel Aviv, Haifa, Safed, Negev Desert, Eilat, Jerusalem, Dead Sea
generalInfo: On this 14-day journey through Israel, experience much of the best that this culturally and historically rich country has to offer. From the lively streets of Tel Aviv to the vast desert mountains of the Negev, Israel is a country that is laden with ancient history and modern comforts. Stroll through Jerusalemâs vibrant market, sample a piece of handmade baklava, and float weightlessly in the waters of the Dead Sea. You can even wander through the winding, cobblestoned streets of Jerusalemâs Old City while memories of its ancient past whisper in your ear.

dayInfo.title: Tel Aviv â Explore Trendy Neighborhoods
dayInfo.description: To begin your adventure, your private guide will meet you at the Tel Aviv airport. Once you have collected all of your belongings, you will be transferred to your luxurious accommodation that overlooks the Mediterranean Sea. You will spend your first evening in the city, sampling some of the countryâs finest cuisine. You will also be guided to Tel Avivâs trendy Neve Tzedek neighborhood, which is known for its art galleries, boutiques, design shops, high-end music bars, and restaurants. You will have time to explore this upscale area at your leisure.

dayInfo.title: Tel Aviv â Private Tour of Tel Aviv
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will enjoy your first Israeli breakfast before embarking on an exciting tour of Tel Avivâs most illustrious sites and neighborhoods. Your tour will begin on Nahalat Binyamin Street, where you will be enchanted by the variety of handicrafts and products that are sold by local artisans. From there, you will continue to the Carmel Market, where you will be guided through the marketâs wonderful stalls full of traditional Israeli products. In the afternoon, you will be led to the beach, where you can spend the afternoon at your leisure, strolling along the sunny promenade and basking in the sun.

dayInfo.title: Tel Aviv â The Jaffa Flea Market
dayInfo.description: Today, you will be transferred to Tel Avivâs infamous Jaffa neighborhood. Your private tour will begin at the Jaffa Clock Tower, which is an important monument that was built during the Ottoman Rule. After lunch, you will be led to the Jaffa Flea Market. Alive with the exciting buzz of bargaining and traditional haggling, the market will throw you into action. From the flea market, you will be guided to one of Jaffaâs higher-end neighborhoods, where you can meander through upscale art galleries, boutiques, and shops to appreciate the unique, artistic style of the area.

dayInfo.title: Haifa â Dine with a Local Druze Family
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will enjoy an Israeli breakfast before transferring to your luxurious accommodation in the nearby port city of Haifa. Upon your arrival, you will have a moment to settle in before meeting your expert guide to embark on the dayâs activities. You will begin your tour with an exclusive visit to Haifaâs Bahaâi gardens. At the base of the gardens, you will arrive in the German Colony of the city, where you will have the opportunity to stroll through its enchanting streets, stopping into the lovely shops and cafes at your leisure. In the afternoon, you will be transferred to the nearby Druze village of Isfiya, where you will be provided with the unique opportunity to enjoy lunch in the home of a local Druze family.

dayInfo.title: Haifa â Visit an Israeli Kibbutz
dayInfo.description: Today, you will enjoy breakfast at your hotel before being transferred to Kibbutz Ein Gev. Israeli Kibbutzim are communal settlements that were originally focused on agricultural pursuits but have now expanded to various other fields. During your visit, you will be provided with the unique opportunity to visit one of the largest and wealthiest of Israelâs kibbutzim. In the afternoon, you will return to Haifa, where you will spend the remainder of the day relaxing at Carmel Beach. At the beach, you can bask in the sun and relax on the white sand. You may elect to partake in water sports, such as windsurfing, surfing, or parasailing.

dayInfo.title: Safed â Explore the Blue City
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will have breakfast at your hotel before transferring to Safed. You will arrive at your luxurious accommodation in the heart of the Artist Quarter. Known as Israelâs infamous Blue City and the birthplace of the mystical Jewish study of Kabbalah, Safed will blow you away with all that the amazing city has to offer. After you have had time to settle in to your suite, you will meet your guide to begin your exploration of Safed. In the evening, you will be transferred to the home of a local Jewish family, where you will enjoy a traditional Shabbat dinner.

dayInfo.title: Safed â One of the Golanâs Finest Wineries
dayInfo.description: Today, you will enjoy breakfast at your hotel before meeting your guide in the lobby to explore the Golan Heights. You will be transferred to the peak of Mt. Bental, which is a remarkable lookout point from Israel into Syria. After you have time to admire the views from Mt. Bental, you will be transferred to one of the regionâs finest wineries, where you will learn about Israelâs winemaking industry in addition to having the opportunity to sample some of the countryâs finest vintages. In the afternoon, you will be transferred to the Sea of Galilee. During your visit, you will have the opportunity to bathe in the sea and to relax on its scenic shores.

dayInfo.title: Negev â Dead Sea and Masada Fortress
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will eat a light breakfast before transferring to the Masada fortress. You will arrive at Masada and ascend to the top of the fortress in time to watch the sunrise over the Dead Sea. Once it begins to warm, you will descend from Masada via cable car before joining your private driver for a short transfer to the Dead Sea. You will spend the next several hours delighting in this natural phenomenon as you float in the seaâs briny waters and cover yourself in natural mineral mud. When you are ready, you will be met by a local Bedouin tribe. You will be welcomed with traditional Bedouin tea and delicacies as you are invited into a tent to experience their unique culture and hear about their customs and practices.

dayInfo.title: Negev â Encounters with a Bedouin Tribe
dayInfo.description: Today, you will embark on an exciting desert trek. During your time in the desert, you will be provided with the wonderful opportunity to ride a camel, which is the traditional form of desert transportation. When you begin to work up an appetite, you will enjoy lunch at your glampsite, where you will then have the opportunity to wander through the Bedouin village. In the evening, you will attend a traditional dinner that will be accompanied by a Bedouin performance of song and dance. During the performance, you will sit cross-legged on colorful cushions and bask in the beauty of the spellbinding movements.

dayInfo.title: Eilat â The Shores of the Red Sea
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will enjoy your final breakfast in the Negev before transferring to the seaside city of Eilat. You will arrive at your beachfront resort in Eilat. After you have had ample opportunity to settle in to your luxurious suite, you will meet your guide for a quick tour of the area. After your tour, you can spend the day luxuriating on the shores of the Red Sea, basking in the sun, and relaxing in complete comfort. As the day presses on, you may elect to swim with dolphins on a several-hour excursion, which can be organized for you by your guide. You may also choose to partake in scuba diving or snorkeling at Eilatâs infamous Coral Beach.

dayInfo.title: Eilat â The Natural Oasis of Ein Gedi
dayInfo.description: Today, you be transferred to the natural oasis of Ein Gedi, where you will spend the morning on a leisurely hike to one of Israelâs most impressive waterfalls. After you have had your fill of Ein Gedi, you will be returned to Eilat, where you will enjoy lunch in the city before spending the remainder of the afternoon at your leisure, relaxing at the gorgeous beaches. You may also decide to indulge in a luxurious spa treatment at your beachfront resort or to delight in a refreshing snack or beverage at one of the many seaside bars and cafes.

dayInfo.title: Jerusalem â Discover the Lively New City
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will enjoy your final breakfast in Eilat before transferring to Jerusalem. As you arrive at your luxurious accommodation in the heart of the city, you will settle in to your extravagant suite before meeting your guide to begin your exploration of Jerusalem. You will begin with a transfer to the magnificent Mount of Olives. From the Mount of Olives, you will be transferred to Mahane Yehuda Market, where you will have the opportunity to indulge in Jerusalemâs finest delicacies from a variety of local vendors. After the market, you will visit the rest of Jerusalemâs modern New City.

dayInfo.title: Jerusalem â Treasures of the Old City
dayInfo.description: Today, you will enjoy an Israeli breakfast at your hotel before meeting your experienced guide to begin your busy day of touring and exploring Jerusalem. You will begin your tour with a transfer to Jerusalemâs Old City, where you will be transported through history as you traverse the cobblestoned streets and winding alleyways. During your tour, you will visit the cityâs most noteworthy destinations and will begin at the Church of the Holy Sepulchre, which is one of Christianityâs holiest sites. After your tour of the Old City has concluded, you will be transferred to the illustrious Yad Vashem, which is the World Holocaust Remembrance Center.

dayInfo.title: Jerusalem â Departure
dayInfo.description: Today you rise to your final day in Israel. After enjoying your final breakfast in Israel, you can spend the morning as you please, strolling through the winding streets of the city or stopping into a coffee shop on Ben Yehuda Street. As you gaze upon the influx of tourists and locals, you may begin to reminisce on your incredible journey thus far. Soon after, you will return to your hotel for your transfer to the airport. Once you are at the airport, you will be led to your terminal for your international flight home.
